attributes.action: reconsider the reduction in  pension choice for those born between 5/4/1960 and 5/4/1965
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The finance act which introduced pension simplification as from 6/4/2006 also unfairly severely reduced the options available for early retirement for those born between 5/4/1960 and 5/4/1965. Such legislation is we believe contrary to the spirit of European legislation on non discrimination on age grounds and should be repealed before we reach 6/4/2010 when it becomes law accoring to UK statute as it curently stands
